content:
What do you dislike most about Zulip?

For more context, please see #zulip > softwarereviews.com
Ha, well, I have a whole list of bugs and feature requests I'm keeping an eye on at https://github.com/pdurbin/zulip/discussions/1 , my wishlist for Zulip.
To their credit, Zulip has already fixed a number of things on my list.
For example, it used to be there were no typing indicators in channels. This was fixed pretty recently. Typing indicators make Zulip feel more like chat and less like a forum.

Some of the things that bother me are a bit petty. For example, when I upload an image, I don't like seeing the filename. You can find ongoing conversation and even new pull requests linked from an issue describing this problem.

I might need to think a bit more about what I dislike. I know the wishlist above is long, but I should probably reorder it. I should think about what really matters. It's far from perfect, but overall, I'm quite happy with Zulip.
